item.title: [US][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.19
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 12, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Oct 6, 00:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/12/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 12/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version (1.20).
Service improvement: The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version (1.20).

item.title: [GRA5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 8, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Dec 1, 12:50 UTC
Update - Update : Referring to the last information, the affected component with this maintenance is Workflow Management. The timeline don't change.

Nov 24, 23:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 08/12/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 08/12/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of GRA5 will be unreachable for a duration of less than 5 minutes
Service improvement : We need to migrate the Mistral services (workflow as a service for OpenStack) for one region from the current production platform to the new production platform based on Kubernetes

item.title: [SBG3][Public Cloud] - S334A02 - S334A01
item.description:
Dec 6, 22:12 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 06/12/2022 05:13 UTC
End Time : 06/12/2022 09:45 UTC
Root cause : Due to a problem on a cooling system, we had experienced downtime on some servers in the racks 334A02 - S334A01. Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
